name: Bar SK The Game
description:
Bar SK The Game is a local competitive multiplayer game about two magical bottles of beer that desire only to fill any glass that comes their way with an endless stream of their very essence. Players will duke it out to see whose colour runs stronger as the foam piles higher and higher. All bets are off when beer is enchanted and the customers of Bar SK are thirsty.

Controls:

Turn and thrust left / right

Player 1: A / S

Player 2: K / L

Bar SK The Game was created for Beer SK, a week long game jam in celebration of the 1st birthday of Bar SK in Melbourne, Australia.

Check out Bar SK

Developers:

Scott Bartlett - @cronobreak

Gerard Delaney - @verbvirus
